Annales des empereurs du Japon, pp. 331-345. ==Events of the Bun'an era== * 1444 (Bun'an 1, 4th month): Kitano Tenman-gū and much of western Kyoto was destroyed by fire.Titsingh, p. 343. ==Related pages == * Muromachi period == References == == Other websites == * National Diet Library, "The Japanese Calendar" - historical overview plus illustrative images from library's collection Bun'an 1st 2nd 3rd 4th 5th 6th 1444 1445 1446 1447 1448 1449 Preceded by: Kakitsu Era or nengō: Bun'an Succeeded by: Hotoku Category:Japanese eras
title: Bun'an
